Event.name: InvokeService
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when DIP server will be started.

Event.name: TerminateService
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when DIP server will be stopped.

Category.name: SynchronizationEvents

Attribute.name: AssociateProfileName
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute is used to audit the Associate Profile Name

Attribute.name: ProfileName
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute is used to audit the Profile Name

Attribute.name: EntryDN
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute is used to audit the entry Distinguished Name

Event.name: Add
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when an entry is added to the connected directory. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the profile that is doing synchronization.

Category.Event: i This event will be logged when an entry is modified in the connected directory. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the profile that is doing synchronization.

Event.name: Delete
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when an entry is deleted from the connected directory. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the profile that is doing synchronization.

Attribute.name: ProfileName
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute is used to audit the Sync Profile Name

Attribute.name: ProvEvent
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute is used to audit the Prov Event

Event.name: UserAdd
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a user is added while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the user.

Event.name: UserModify
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a user is modified while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the user.

Event.name: UserDelete
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a user is deleted while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the user.

Event.name: GroupAdd
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a group is added while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the group.

Event.name: GroupModify
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a group is modify while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the group.

Event.name: GroupDelete
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a group is deleted while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the group.

Event.name: IdentityAdd
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when an identity is added while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the identity.

Event.name: IdentityModify
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when an identity is modify while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the identity.

Event.name: IdentityDelete
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when an identity is deleted while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the identity.

Event.name: SubscriptionAdd
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a subscription is added while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the subscription.

Event.name: SubscriptionModify
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a subscription is modify while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the subscription.

Event.name: SubscriptionDelete
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a subscription is deleted while provisioning. The Initiator of this event will be the name of the application that is provisioning the subscription.

Event.name: DeleteProvProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a provisioning profile is deleted. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: UpdateProvProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a provisioning profile is upadated. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: ActivateProvProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a provisioning profile is enabled. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: DeactivateProvProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a provisioning profile is disabled. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: CreateSyncProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a synchronization profile is created. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: DeleteSyncProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a synchronization profile is deleted. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: UpdateSyncProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a synchronization profile is upadated. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: ActivateSyncProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a synchronization profile is enabled. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: DeactivateSyncProfile
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a synchronization profile is disabled. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: SyncProfileUpdateChgNum
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when an updatechgnum operation is performed on synchronization profile. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: ExpressSyncSetup
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when an express config operation of a synchronization profile is performed. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: SyncProfileBootstrap
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a bootstrap operation is performed on synchronization profile. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: SyncProfileExtAuthPlugins
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when an external authentication plugins are applied on synchronization profile. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Event.name: ProvProfileBulkProv
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a bulkprov operation is performed on a provisioning profile. The Initiator of this event will be the component name.

Attribute.name: JobName
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute is used to audit the Scheduler Job Name

Attribute.name: JobType
Attribute.HelpText: This attribute is used to audit the Scheduler Job Name

Event.name: AddJob
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a job is scheduled.

Event.name: RemoveJob
Event.HelpText: This event will be logged when a scheduled job is removed.

FilterPresetDefinition.helpText: Low filter preset .To be defined by the component
FilterPresetDefinition.name: Low

FilterPresetDefinition.helpText: Medium filter preset. To be defined by the component
FilterPresetDefinition.name: Medium
